Name: De Biergrill
Review Text:
Likes - the atmosphere is pleasant and is a customary sports pub. They have a great beer selection.
The service is nice and a very beautiful dark haired girl served us and was an …

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text:
Nice ambience, good music, good beer choices, tasty meat dishes.
Great stew and smash potatos dish!!!

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Nice Grill, very good food and friendly staff, thanks!

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Great food, if not on the tad side of slow from ordering-to-table. The Royale with Cheese burger is their signature dish. The service is good and there are regular game nights and quizzes. Plenty of local beers on tap too.

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Excellent food, excellent beer, and excellent service! I'll come back here in a heartbeat whenever I'm in town.

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Biergrill is a very cozy bar that has both good food and a good beer selection. Their burger is one of the better I’ve had in Amsterdam, but they also have other dishes that are really good. Try whatever oedipus beer they have on tap, they change this over time.

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Good atmosphere, great selection of craft beers and food is good in all its simplicity.. we had the clubsteak with chimichurri LOVED IT! cosy bar with friendly staff and if there is a football match you would like to see they are happy to put it on the big screen! We'll be back!

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Food was delicious but the service let it down a bit. We got one meal at a time and after about 8 mins the fries finnally arrived so we had to eat them after I finished my steak. Still 4 stars from the quality and price :)

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Went here a couple of times. Good atmosphere, great food, reasonable prices. Weeks later I was thinking of how good this place was and the beer they had that you can't find just anywhere

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Super friendly staff, but not quite fast service here, but it's ok as I wasn't in a hurry. I had their Amsterdam skewer and charcuterie. Was told it shoul be enough for one person, well actually you should pick either of those as it is too …

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: The place changed its concept a few months ago because the listened to the neighbourhood. So now they are providing something the actual people living around like. A extended livingroom! Good food! Good portions. Reasonable price. And best of all, friendly service.

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Best of bolo, a very broad selection of special beers, terrace with sun after 4pm and is good menu from snacks, hamburgers, sate to desserts. Run by friendly local people.

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: By fat the worst burger i have eaten; really bad presentation, the bread was very cheap, they didn't even cut the lettuce, just threw big pieces there, and on top of that i found it very pricey! Not recommend it at all!

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Good tasty food, but prices are high, 34 euros for 2 burgers, 2 drinks en one fries that was mini-hamster size and a drop of mayonnaise. you will leave the place hungry.

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Really good burgers, good selection of beers, friendly staff! Should you be staying in Bos en Lommer it's a place worth visiting!

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Good beers, nice food, friendly staff. What more do you need? Good atmosphere? They even have that.

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Great Urban beer and grill restaurant. The dishes are very tasty, they have great boardgames and nice staff

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Bad burgers: they overcooked the meat, the salad was not fresh and it lacked sauce. Save yourself the trouble in going to this place.

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Nice food in good atmosphere. Certainly the best in the area!

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Service and interior are ok.  Just not my type of place but I imagine that for 20something hipsters this would be a perfect place.

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Great plce to watch football, I only wish they had a second tv for when is too crowded

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Really good burgers and fries. Waitresses are really friendly and it looks great.

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Great food and nice service ^^ I wanna come back 😋

Name: De Biergrill

Name: De Biergrill
Review Text: Great spot for a quick bite and nice beers. Also perfect for watching a football game

Review Text: Great bar, friendly people, thanks for your hospitality Keiron
